Sound files needed for Duck Hunt:

1. shot.mp3 - Sound effect for shooting
2. quack.mp3 - Duck quack sound effect
3. reload.mp3 - Sound effect for reloading
4. level-up.mp3 - Sound effect for leveling up
5. game-over.mp3 - Sound effect for game over

These sound files need to be added to the repository. You can use free sound effects from sources like:
- Freesound (https://freesound.org/)
- OpenGameArt (https://opengameart.org/)
- ZapSplat (https://www.zapsplat.com/)

Make sure to use royalty-free sounds or sounds with appropriate licenses for your project.
